segments.text: I see the sunlight pouring through the window; it makes everything look deceptively peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflow from the sink tells a different story, one of chaos in the domestic sphere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of amusement and concern watching the boy teetering on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is he really willing to gamble his safety for a cookie?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, so hopeful as she reaches for the sky, unaware of the potential disaster ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical, yet I wish the woman would turn around and see what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The clean kitchen feels like a facade hiding the imminent mess about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
